definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Spare parts shall be packed separately from the vessels.
sentences.chinese: 备件应同容器分开包装。

sentences.english: Take charge of the purchase requests for facility parts and remodeling plan execution.
sentences.chinese: 负责厂务用备件的采购申请及加工计划。

sentences.english: In the future the machines will need spare parts and maintenance .
sentences.chinese: 这些机器将来会需要备件和维修保养。

sentences.english: Responsible for safekeeping spare parts and supporting for production in time.
sentences.chinese: 管理备件备品仓库，并及时对生产提供支援。

sentences.english: A variety of large-scale imports of DCS system spare parts .
sentences.chinese: 各种大型进口DCS系统备品，备件。
维修成本和备件价格较高。

sentences.english: We are also operator and agency of marine equipment & spare parts imports and exports.
sentences.chinese: 代理及自营船舶机械设备和备件的进出口业务。

sentences.english: Spare parts also will be purchased.
Spare parts management, repair and cost control.
sentences.chinese: 协助负责相关零备件管理，控制维修费用。

sentences.english: This also provides the added benefit of common spare parts in a multi-furnace facility.
sentences.chinese: 这也提供了炉设施增加了一个多效益的共同备件研究。

sentences.english: In charge of checking and accepting for all utility equipments or machines to be maintained.
sentences.chinese: 负责动力设备零备件及材料计划，到货验收及保管。

sentences.english: As for existing spare parts on-site, to use as needed to depletion.
sentences.chinese: 至于现场现有的备件，根据需要使用枯竭。

sentences.english: The spare parts are very important for ensuring the good conditions of imported equipments.
sentences.chinese: 要保证引进设备的良好状态，备件工作很重要。

sentences.english: Ensure economic store of spare parts and consumables and set proper safety stock.
sentences.chinese: 制定设备维护备件和消耗品，设定安全库存。

sentences.english: The next step is to choose spares.
The only spare part necessary is a 9V battery.
sentences.chinese: 唯一需要的备件是一个9V的电池。

definition: to overhaul/to examine and fix (a motor)/to service (a vehicle)
to procure (for an enterprise etc)/to purchase
to order goods/to place an order
to repair/to fix/to prune/to trim/(coll.) to sort sb out/to fix sb
to troubleshoot/to check components individually for problems/troubleshooting
